sentences.english: It was dusk when the hunter drove into the barn and unhitched his horse.
sentences.chinese: 当猎人驾驶入谷仓并且放松了他的马，它是黄昏。

sentences.english: Fireworks light up the sky over a grain elevator in Bowlus, Minnesota.
sentences.chinese: 烟火照亮了明尼苏达州玻鲁斯的一间谷仓的上空。

sentences.english: Vinegar-faced Joseph projected his head from a round window of the barn.
sentences.chinese: 苦脸的约瑟夫从谷仓的一个圆窗里探出头来。

sentences.english: Hareton, drive those dozen sheep into the barn porch.
sentences.chinese: 海尔顿，把这些样都赶到谷仓前的门廊去。

sentences.english: We had a famous set-to at rat-hunting all the morning in my father's great barns;
sentences.chinese: 我们在我父亲的大谷仓里逮老鼠，大闹了一个上午。

sentences.english: The soldiers bedded down in a barn .
sentences.chinese: 士兵们在谷仓里打铺过夜。

sentences.english: However, I have a barn full of animals that supply me with all the food I need.
sentences.chinese: 但我得谷仓里注满了动物，让我吃喝不用愁。

sentences.english: The farmer built a shed for his tractor next to the barn.
sentences.chinese: 那个农场主在谷仓边盖了一间拖拉机棚。

sentences.english: The knaves who set fire to the barn have been caught and sent to the prison.
sentences.chinese: 纵火烧谷仓的骗子被抓起来送到牢里去了。

sentences.english: The building also used reclaimed materials extensively, including siding from a barn.
sentences.chinese: 该建筑还利用回收材料广泛，包括从谷仓壁板。

sentences.english: There was the barn and the barnyard full of cows.
sentences.chinese: 前面是一个谷仓，谷仓的院子里挤满了母牛。

sentences.english: There was the barn and the barnyard full of cows.
sentences.chinese: 前面是一个谷仓，谷仓的院子里挤满了母牛。

sentences.english: The live in a converted barn.
sentences.chinese: 他们住在谷仓改建成的房屋。

sentences.english: The college farm has solar-powered barns, gardens, fruit trees, greenhouses and animals.
sentences.chinese: 学院农场有太阳能的谷仓，花园，果树，花房和家禽。

sentences.english: Help me haul the hay bales into the barn.
sentences.chinese: 帮我把这些干草捆拖到谷仓里。

definition: granary/barn/fig. bread basket (of fertile agricultural land)
